segments.text: I'm watching the children intently in this drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is quite daring, climbing on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward significantly; I'm sure it's going to tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hands are busy: one in the cookie jar, the other holding a plate to catch his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is his accomplice, arms outstretched, clearly expecting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so engrossed in their secret mission, it's almost adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I really worry about that stool's precarious position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A fall could be quite painful, and there's water on the floor too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why isn't the woman noticing this dangerous play?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lack of adult supervision in this moment is truly frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those cookies must be worth the risk, judging by their focused expressions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them or stabilize the stool myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so close to getting caught, or worse, getting hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a classic scene of childhood adventure and looming disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
